item.title: Belajar Bahasa Jepang
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
Belajar bahasa jepang sangat bermanfaat baik untuk diri sendiri maupun untuk global. Karena pada hakikatnya bahasa adalah jembatan komunikasi untuk menyapa dunia. Dan bahasa jepang adalah bahasa yang cukup diminati secara global. Masyarakat global awalnya mengetahui bahasa jepang dari anime/ kartun jepang.belajar bahasa jepang pula, akan membuat anda bisa bersaing di dunia kerja.

Dengan mengikuti kursus ini, Anda akan mempelajari materi-materi tentang dasar mempelajari bahasa jepang seperti;

  • Pengenalan bahasa jepang

  • Bagaimana cara menulis Katakana & Hiragana

  • Cara pengucapan yang baik dan benar dalam bahasa jepang

  • Pembelajaran dasar bahasa jepang

  • Kosakata, Dialog, serta expresi dalam bahasa jepang

Dengan mempelajari materi-materi tersebut, Anda akan lebih paham dalam mempelajari materi bahasa jepang secara lebih mendalam, mulai dari mempelajari pengenalan bahasa jepang, pelafalan kosakata, grammar, pendengaran, hingga intonasi yang baik dan benar dalam bahasa jepang. Serta yang terpenting adalah faham dengaan huruf Hiragana dan Katakana.


Dengan mempelajari dasar-dasar mempelajari bahasa jepang pada kursus ini, anda akan dapat meningkatkan skill individu, membuka kesempatan untuk dapat bekerja di perusahaan jepang, kunci mengenal budaya jepang, peluang memperoleh beasiswa di jepang dan masih banyak lagi manfaat yang akan di dapat.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Pengenalan bahasa Jepang Bagaimana cara menulis Katakana & Hiragana Cara pengucapan yang baik dan benar dalam bahasa Jepang Pembelajaran dasar bahasa Jepang Kosakata, Dialog, serta expressi dalam bahasa Jepang
Tidak ada persyaratan khusus untuk mengikuti kursus ini, karena memang dibuat untuk pemula yang ingin belajar bahasa Jepang
Kursus ini ideal untuk pemula yang ingin belajar tentang bahasa Jepang Kursus ini sangat cocok bagi Anda yang ingin menjadi pelajar di jepang atau bekerja di perusahaan Jepang

item.title: Learn HTML5 Programming From Scratch
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
HTML5 is one of the hot web technologies and is widely gaining acceptance across mobile and web. In our course, you get a complete resource that can get you started on application development for HTML5. In our course, you work on actual examples and go through important concepts required for thorough knowledge.

In our course, you will start with basic HTML tags. You will learn how to create HTML websites and use CSS in your work before we start discussing HTML5. We do not assume any prior knowledge so we go through the concepts from the beginner’s point of view. In our HTML5 lectures, we start with new tags and forms. We then gradually move to advance topics like Drag and Drop and Multimedia. We follow it with difficult topics like Geolocation, WebStorage, and Application cache. This course creates easy-to-grasp examples for each of the concepts and by the end of it, you will be able to understand the complete picture rather than just bits and pieces of the technology.
item.excerpt:encoded: A Complete HTML5 Programming Course for Beginners

JavaScript is one of the most popular programming languages in the world because it’s easy to learn, and it can do amazing things. If you’re interested in web development, it’s also a language that you simply must learn to be effective.

item.title: Advanced C programming course
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
The C programming language in 2020 is still one of the most popular and widely used languages. Having C programming skills gives you great career options, but learning the C language, particularly some of the trickier advanced stuff can be really difficult.

This course is designed to take your basic C skills to the next level and help you obtain mastery of the language by helping you understand advanced concepts of the C programming language, enabling you to master the art of problem-solving in programming using efficient, proven methods.

You’ll learn how to write high-quality C code and to make yourself more marketable for higher-level programming positions.

Just some of the topics in this huge 28-hour course include Threads, Function Pointers, Double Pointers, Recursion, Networking using Sockets, Bit manipulation, Macros, Signals, Storage Classes and loads more. Check the curriculum on this page for full details of what is included in this very comprehensive course.

item.title: Sejong Cyber University <TOPIK(한국어능력시험) Ⅱ> Writing(KOR/ENG)
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
<TOPIK II> 쓰기 강의는 한국어 학습자가 <TOPIK Ⅱ(3급~6급)>에서 높은 점수를 받을 수 있도록 돕기 위해 제작되었습니다. 이 강의는 쓰기 12강으로 구성되어 있습니다. 각 강의 영상에서는 문항 유형 분석과 자주 나오는 어휘와 문법, 기출문제 풀이와 고득점 전략 등을 체계적으로 안내합니다.

<TOPIK II> Writing lectures are designed to help Korean learners get high scores in <TOPIK II (Levels 3~6)>. This course consists of 12 lessons of writing. Each lecture video systematically guides you through question type analysis, frequently used vocabulary and grammar, solving previous questions, and high-scoring strategies.

  • 이 강의에는 한국어와 영어 자막이 제공됩니다.

  • 동일한 내용의 중국어, 베트남어 강의가 있습니다.

  • Korean and English subtitles are available for this lecture.

  • There are lectures in Chinese and Vietnamese with the same content.

Instructor Introduction

Je Eun Kwon is a professional Korean language instructor who completed her Ph.D. in Korean Language and Literature at Sookmyung Women's University.

About our institute

Sejong Cyber ​​University’s Korean Language Education Center is an affiliated institution of Sejong Cyber ​​University, a 4-year remote university. It is developing to revitalize online/offline Korean language education. Internationally, interest and interest in K-Culture continues to increase, and domestically, as we enter a multicultural society where different cultures coexist, interest in Korean language education will increase in the future. we are operating a regular program differentiated from other institutions' Korean language classes to keep pace with this demand. It uses a social integration program for immigrants who want to adapt to Korean society.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: You can understand the question types for each area in <TOPIK II>. You can learn frequently used vocabulary and grammar in <TOPIK II>. You can learn how to solve problems in <TOPIK II>. Foreigners or overseas Koreans studying for the <TOPIK II> to enter or graduate from a Korean university. Foreigners or overseas Koreans who wish to enter into a Korean company. item.title: Power Prep for Korean language exam 한국어능력시험 TOPIK Ⅱ Reading
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
Deskripsi

Power Prep for 한국어능력시험 TOPIK Ⅱ Reading is one of the TOPIK prep courses provided by K-Study Korea. This course focuses on getting students ready for the exam on their own pace. Throughout the lessons, students are guided from the test format, various text styles, and how to find correct answers fast. Students will be able to pass the exam easier and time saving way and also improve their own vocab, grammar and reading comprehension skills.

 

About TOPIK Korean lnaguage exam

TOPIK (Test of Proficiency in korean) is an official exam to test Korean language proficiency that is run by Korean government. This exam is a must exam for those who would like to come to Korea for study, work, or marriage. Basically, students need level 3 to apply for a university and level 4 for graduation. To be employeed by major Korean companies, level 5 or above is neededed.

 

TOPIK results are used for:

University admission and academic management of foreign Korean Government Scholars, university admission for foreigners and overseas Koreans who have completed 12 years of education abroad, obtaining working visa for those who want to be employed at Korean companies and others such as for spouse visa, medical doctor qualification, etc.

 

Instrustor

Su Hyun Kim is an proffesional Korean language instructor who is currently teaching at Korean Language Center of Kookmin University. She has majored in Korean Language and Literature and has Bachelor and Master’s Degree from Kookmin University. She started her career as Korean Instructor at Seoul Korean Academy.

What will students need to know or do before starting this course?

These lectures are based on the textbook , New TOPIK 2 Reading for Intermediate& Advanced (paperback, Pagijong press) but there will be no big problem watching lectures without textbook. Students need to complete at least level 2 of Korean language to understand these lectures, The lectures are done only in Korean. You should be able to understand intermediate level of Korean language and able to read and write Korean language.

If you would like to order the textbook, contact us by leaving a message.

item.title: Project Management with Trello
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded: Are you new to PHP or need a refresher? Then this course will help you get all the fundamentals of Procedural PHP, Object Oriented PHP, MYSQLi and ending the course by building a CMS system similar to WordPress, Joomla or Drupal. Knowing PHP has allowed me to make enough money to stay home and make courses like this one for students all over the world. Being a PHP developer can allow anyone to make really good money online and offline, developing dynamic applications. Knowing PHP will allow you to build web applications, websites or Content Management systems, like WordPress, Facebook, Twitter or even Google. There is no limit to what you can do with this knowledge. PHP is one of the most important web programming languages to learn, and knowing it, will give you SUPER POWERS in the web development world and job market place. Why? Because Millions of websites and applications (the majority) use PHP. You can find a job anywhere or even work on your own, online and in places like freelancer or Odesk. You can definitely make a substantial income once you learn it. I will not bore you :) I take my courses very seriously but at the same time I try to make it fun since I know how difficult learning from an instructor with a monotone voice or boring attitude is. This course is fun, and when you need some energy to keep going, you will get it from me. My Approach Practice, practice and more practice. Every section inside this course has a practice lecture at the end, reinforcing everything with went over in the lectures. I also created a small application the you will be able to download to help you practice PHP. To top it off, we will build and awesome CMS like WordPress, Joomla or Drupal.

item.title: Sales Training: Practical Sales Techniques
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded: Are you new to PHP or need a refresher? Then this course will help you get all the fundamentals of Procedural PHP, Object Oriented PHP, MYSQLi and ending the course by building a CMS system similar to WordPress, Joomla or Drupal. Knowing PHP has allowed me to make enough money to stay home and make courses like this one for students all over the world. Being a PHP developer can allow anyone to make really good money online and offline, developing dynamic applications. Knowing PHP will allow you to build web applications, websites or Content Management systems, like WordPress, Facebook, Twitter or even Google. There is no limit to what you can do with this knowledge. PHP is one of the most important web programming languages to learn, and knowing it, will give you SUPER POWERS in the web development world and job market place. Why? Because Millions of websites and applications (the majority) use PHP. You can find a job anywhere or even work on your own, online and in places like freelancer or Odesk. You can definitely make a substantial income once you learn it. I will not bore you :) I take my courses very seriously but at the same time I try to make it fun since I know how difficult learning from an instructor with a monotone voice or boring attitude is. This course is fun, and when you need some energy to keep going, you will get it from me. My Approach Practice, practice and more practice. Every section inside this course has a practice lecture at the end, reinforcing everything with went over in the lectures. I also created a small application the you will be able to download to help you practice PHP. To top it off, we will build and awesome CMS like WordPress, Joomla or Drupal.
item.excerpt:encoded: Sales is all about listening to people and prescribing a solution. In every job you'll come across sales moments, whether you're selling yourself in a job interview or selling products to customers - it's an essential skill in all career paths. Sales needn't be slimy, immoral, or complicated - it's simply about getting the best solution for the customer so they are thrilled to buy from you.

Those currently working in sales looking to increase their figures Those considering sales as a career in the future Anyone who has to deal with customers face-to-face

I'll be using the latest version of the program - Photoshop CC 2019, but all the content is explained for all users, no matter what version you have installed. Photoshop Elements is not compatible with this course.

item.excerpt:encoded: This course will guide you through every single step from installation to finished website. I'll show you how you can install Wordpress on your own computer for free, so you don't have to pay for a domain name or hosting fees while you complete this course. Once you've got Wordpress installed on your computer, you will learn how to build and run a successful, beautiful, responsive-design website you can be proud of.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Know how to configure Wordpress for best results Understand plugins & themes and how to find/install them Protect their Wordpress website from hackers and spammers Create a static homepage useful for most websites, or a blog like homepage useful for bloggers. Create an affiliate site for passive, recurring income Create a Responsive Website that looks good on any browser

No prior knowledge of Wordpress is required as everything will be covered in this course. You will need a working computer and a web browser connected to the internet.. You don't need any coding experience at all. That is the beauty of Wordpress.

If you want to learn Wordpress without paying for a web host, this course is perfect. I'll show you how you can install Wordpress on your very own computer while you learn. This course is for you if you want to build a website, whether for personal or business reasons. If you want to learn to master Wordpress without getting bogged down with technical jargon, this course is for you. If you want to get step-by-step, over-the-shoulder tuition from an ex-school teacher who has been using and teaching Wordpress since 2004. This course is perfect for you if you are taking over an existing Wordpress website, or want to build one from scratch, but don't know where to start. This course is for anyone that wants to be the Wordpress goto guy or gal.

item.excerpt:encoded: Do you want to learn the number #1 programming language that powers the internet? Are you tired of wasting your time and money on random youtube videos or JavaScript courses that are either too simple, or too difficult to follow? Or are you struggling to deeply understand and apply JavaScript to real projects? If your answer is a big YES... Then this is exactly the course you are looking for!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: A true understanding of how JavaScript works behind the scenes What's new in ES6: arrow functions, classes, default and rest parameters, etc. Practice your new skills with coding challenges (solutions included) Organize and structure your code using JavaScript patterns like modules Get friendly and fast support in the course Q&A Downloadable lectures, code and design assets for all projects

No coding experience is necessary to take this course! I take you from beginner to expert! Any computer and OS will work — Windows, macOS or Linux. We will set up your text editor the course. A basic understanding of HTML and CSS is a plus, but not a must! The course includes a 5-minutes HTML and CSS crash course.

Take this course if you want to gain a deep understanding of the most popular programming language in the world: JavaScript. Take this course if you have taken other JavaScript courses but: 1) still don't really understand JavaScript, or 2) still don't feel confident to code real-world apps. This course is perfect for you! Take this course if you're interested in using popular libraries/frameworks like React, Angular or Node. Take this course if you want to get started with programming in general: JavaScript is a great language to learn how to code.

item.title: PHP Beginners - Become a PHP Master
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded: Are you new to PHP or need a refresher? Then this course will help you get all the fundamentals of Procedural PHP, Object Oriented PHP, MYSQLi and ending the course by building a CMS system similar to WordPress, Joomla or Drupal. Knowing PHP has allowed me to make enough money to stay home and make courses like this one for students all over the world. Being a PHP developer can allow anyone to make really good money online and offline, developing dynamic applications. Knowing PHP will allow you to build web applications, websites or Content Management systems, like WordPress, Facebook, Twitter or even Google. There is no limit to what you can do with this knowledge. PHP is one of the most important web programming languages to learn, and knowing it, will give you SUPER POWERS in the web development world and job market place. Why? Because Millions of websites and applications (the majority) use PHP. You can find a job anywhere or even work on your own, online and in places like freelancer or Odesk. You can definitely make a substantial income once you learn it. I will not bore you :) I take my courses very seriously but at the same time I try to make it fun since I know how difficult learning from an instructor with a monotone voice or boring attitude is. This course is fun, and when you need some energy to keep going, you will get it from me. My Approach Practice, practice and more practice. Every section inside this course has a practice lecture at the end, reinforcing everything with went over in the lectures. I also created a small application the you will be able to download to help you practice PHP. To top it off, we will build and awesome CMS like WordPress, Joomla or Drupal.

This was my first time taking an online course. The content is excellent, and the instructors are also excellent. How much you learn from this course is pretty much what you put into it.

item.title: Power Prep for Korean language exam 한국어능력시험 TOPIK Ⅱ Reading
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
Deskripsi

Power Prep for 한국어능력시험 TOPIK Ⅱ Reading is one of the TOPIK prep courses provided by K-Study Korea. This course focuses on getting students ready for the exam on their own pace. Throughout the lessons, students are guided from the test format, various text styles, and how to find correct answers fast. Students will be able to pass the exam easier and time saving way and also improve their own vocab, grammar and reading comprehension skills.   About TOPIK Korean lnaguage exam TOPIK (Test of Proficiency in korean) is an official exam to test Korean language proficiency that is run by Korean government. This exam is a must exam for those who would like to come to Korea for study, work, or marriage. Basically, students need level 3 to apply for a university and level 4 for graduation. To be employeed by major Korean companies, level 5 or above is neededed.   TOPIK results are used for: University admission and academic management of foreign Korean Government Scholars, university admission for foreigners and overseas Koreans who have completed 12 years of education abroad, obtaining working visa for those who want to be employed at Korean companies and others such as for spouse visa, medical doctor qualification, etc.   Instrustor Su Hyun Kim is an proffesional Korean language instructor who is currently teaching at Korean Language Center of Kookmin University. She has majored in Korean Language and Literature and has Bachelor and Master’s Degree from Kookmin University. She started her career as Korean Instructor at Seoul Korean Academy. What will students need to know or do before starting this course? These lectures are based on the textbook , New TOPIK 2 Reading for Intermediate& Advanced (paperback, Pagijong press) but there will be no big problem watching lectures without textbook. Students need to complete at least level 2 of Korean language to understand these lectures, The lectures are done only in Korean. You should be able to understand intermediate level of Korean language and able to read and write Korean language. If you would like to order the textbook, contact us by leaving a message.
item.excerpt:encoded: Learn How To Build The Perfect Diet & Meal Plan For Improved Health, Better Weight Loss And More Muscle Gains Hi, I'm Felix Harder fitness and dieting coach and amazon best selling author. My "Nutrition Masterclass" is designed for anyone who wants to get the most out of their diet, no matter if you're an athlete, bodybuilder or simply want to live a healthier life.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Great clarity in explanations and thoroughly enjoyed the course. I had been working out for quite a while, but a few little things we might miss out from a diet perspective are covered well in detail here. Especially loved how you structured the entire focus area of dieting into most important ones to lesser ones.

It helped me realize the importance of eating good food. Even carbs. I was deathly afraid of them but now I see that in moderation, they\'re good for you! I also enjoyed the more scientific explanations of how calories, carbs and nutrients work to keep the body healthy. Thank you!

item.title: Cara Alami Menguasai Bahasa Inggris Semudah Bahasa Indonesia
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
Description

Kelas bahasa Inggris ini menjelaskan langkah demi langkah bagaimana menguasai bahasa Inggris dengan cara alami, sehingga menjadi mudah seperti orang Indonesia menguasai bahasa Indonesia, termasuk penyiapan perangkat dan pengumpulan materi yang secara alami sudah tersedia di lingkungan sekitar, namun Anda tidak menyadari. Dengan cara alami ini anda dapat menguasai SPEAKING, LISTENING, READING & WRITING sekaligus hanya dalam satu langkah.........!! Tanpa ribet dengan tata bahasa & tanpa capek menghafal daftar kosa kata.   Cara Populer Menguasa Bahasa Inggris Mari kita lihat proses belajar bahasa Inggris yang populer dan digunakan secara luas. Antara tata bahasa dan kosa kata dipisahkan dan dipelajari sendiri-sendiri secara berurutan seperti bagan dibawah ini: Anda diajarkan untuk menguasai aturan main tata bahasa. 2. Anda diminta menghafal daftar kosa kata yang panjang 3. Dengan kosa kata yang dihafal Anda menyusun kalimat sendiri berdasarkan tata bahasa. Namun begitu mulai menyusun kalimat Anda ragu, apakah tata bahasanya sudah benar, apakah pemilihan kosa katanya sudah tepat. Lalu Anda tinjau kembali kedua aspek tersebut. Rasa takut salah ini juga yang menjadi biang kerok munculnya rasa tidak percaya diri ketika bicara dalam bahasa Inggris. Hal-hal seperti inilah membuat cara populer kurang berhasil membuat anda mampu menguasai bahasa Inggris. Cara populer itu terdesain agar siswa mampu mengerjakan soal-soal dari pelajaran bahasa Inggris Proses belajar populer ini sangat berat, karena anda harus belajar tiga kali. Pertama belajar tata bahasa yang bikin pusing, kedua menghafal kosa kata yang membosankan, ketiga menyusun kalimat yang sering salah.   Keunggulan Cara Alami Menguasai Bahasa Inggris Semudah Bahasa Indonesia Hanya dengan satu langkah saja Anda bisa menguasai 9 aspek bahasa sekaligus yaitu 1. Kosa kata 2. Tata bahasa 3. Mendengar 4. Bicara 5. Membaca 6. Menulis 7. Pelafalan 8. Percaya diri 9. Budaya berbahasa Ya...Anda tidak salah membaca, dengan cara alami ini Anda dapat menguasai sembilan aspek bahasa Inggris sekaligus hanya dalam satu langkah. Maka dari itu, anak-anak kecil di kota London semua pandai berkomunikasi dalam bahasa Inggris, padahal mereka belum mengenal kamus bahasa Inggris, tenses, adjectives, pronouns dan lain-lainya, bahkan menulis saja belum bisa......Mereka belajar dengan cara alami...
item.excerpt:encoded: Untuk pemula yang ingin menguasai kemampuan percakapan bahasa Inggris dengan mudah, cepat dan menyenangkan

Hannah Montana’s

Lovely & Legible Lettering

Do you ever scroll through images of beautiful lettering on Instagram and think to yourself that if you could do the same?

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://localhost/wordpress.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Our website address is: https://preview.tutorlms.com/starter.

What personal data we collect and why we collect it

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Contact forms

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics

Who we share your data with

If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Your contact information

Additional information

How we protect your data

What data breach procedures we have in place

What third parties we receive data from

What automated decision making and/or profiling we do with user data

Industry regulatory disclosure requirements

Phasellus ac cursus lorem, quis congue ante. Mauris at imperdiet dui, quis accumsan leo. Nunc accumsan accumsan porta. Etiam condimentum justo in risus dignissim viverra. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed sed placerat justo. Aliquam est metus, tempus eget varius vitae, convallis ac mi. Sed congue in lectus id viverra.

item.title: University
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
Kelas Bahasa Terbuka

Belajar Bahasa Adalah Yang Terbaik!

Mulai Kelas

The right to remain vocal

Learning often happens in classrooms but it doesn't have to. Use Eduflow to facilitate learning experiences no matter the context.

22 May, 2020

Not even the criminal justice system.

10 Jun, 2021

A history that can’t be suppressed

01 Feb, 2020

Fundamentals of DSLR Photography

31 Dec, 2020

There’s no system too big to reimagine

Tentang LanguaLeap

Belajar Bahasa untuk Masa Depan dan Karir

LinguLeap adalah platform media pembelajaran untuk mengasah skill dan kemampuan mu khusus dalam subjek "Bahasa" yang bisa membantu mu meraih impian masa depan dan kesuksesan karir mu.

Benefit yang Bisa Didapatkan

Instruktur dan Guru

Terbaik

Sertifikat

Untuk Apresiasi Prestasimu

Sukses

Untuk Karir dan Masa Depan

Kelas Bahasa Terpopuler

Lebih Lanjut 4.50 (2)

Cara Alami Menguasai Bahasa Inggris Semudah Bahasa Indonesia

Enroll Course 5.00 (1)

Nutrition: Build Your Perfect Diet & Meal Plan

Enroll Course 5.00 (2)

PHP Beginners – Become a PHP Master

Enroll Course

Kategori Semua Kelas

Inggris

Mandarin

Jepang

Korean

Arabic

Prancis

item.title: Admission
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
Admission

Home > Bachelor Of Science in Business Administration

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yGDwk4z9EEg

Email us

info@mail.com

support@mail.com

Visit us

34 Madison Street,

NY, USA 10005

Guides to undergraduate study

Doubling my 9–5 salary several times in my career is something I never thought would happen. My career went from startup land to call center operator in a short space of time.

That meant going from six-figures down to the minimum wage in my home country of Australia. And to top it off, I have no degrees in anything business related — unless you count a sound engineering qualification.

If an uneducated guy from the home of the Kangaroo can double their salary, there is definitely hope for you. Popular career websites like “Seek” suggest the typical advice about doing better in your performance review or getting more education from a university. This advice is out of date and I have watched many colleagues fall for this trap and only end up disappointed.

Doubling your salary, or at the very least increasing it significantly, is about breaking the norm and trying a few things that are a bit more radical as you’re about to see with these simple tips below.

The goal should be more than money

Okay so you can make more money but if that’s your only goal, the extra zeroes on your bank balance will get really boring real quick.

Applying to University

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: About Me
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded: Namaku Alya Fauziyah dan aku seorang penulis. Aku mulai menjadi seorang penulis saat aku berada di bangku kelas 1 SMP saat itu aku senang membuat sebuah cerita di dalam pikiran ku (imajinasi) namun aku tidak tahu harus ditumpahkan kemana karya itu, maka dari itu aku menumpahkan hasil cerita yang sudah ku buat itu ku ke dalam sebuh tulisan. Dan kini usia ku berumur 17 tahun, aku bersekolah di SMKN 1 Cimahi jurusan Rekayasa Perangkat Lunak. Selain menulis aku juga membuat sebuah website dan aplikasi mobile sebagai projek sekolah ku.

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
Learn Anything

We denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms

Flexible Learning

With righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demor alized by the charms

Learn With Experts

We denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XHOmBV4js_E

Our goals. Our mission.

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout normal distribution

On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying through shrinking from toil and pain.

Meet The Team

Explore our awesome team members

William M

CEO

Anthony

Instructor

Alber

Developer

Rose Simmons

Designer

Mary V. Duck

Designer

We denounce with righteous indignation and dislike
men who are so beguiled

Call us

Mail us

item.title: About Me
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
• Demo
    • single instructor
    • University
  • Courses
  • About
    • About Me
    • About Us
  • Pages
    • Instructors
    • Instructor Registration
    • Student Registration
  • Contact Us

About Me

Hello, I’m Smith

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout normal distribution

On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue; and equal blame belongs to those who fail in their duty through weakness of will, which is the same as saying through shrinking from toil and pain.

EDUCATION

Dream International School (2002 - 2006)

Secondary School

Neo Tech Institute (2007-2010)

Diploma Engineering

University Of Canada (2010 - 2014)

Engineering

EXPERIENCE

Fech Art USA (2008 - 2012)

 Senior Designer

Global Git (2012 - 2013)

 Head of Idea

item.content:encoded:
Kelas Bahasa Terbuka

Belajar Bahasa
Adalah Yang
Terbaik!

Disini adalah tempat untuk belajar Bahasa yang kamu inginkan. Kursus ini akan membantu mu meraih impian mu. Mulailah dengan membuka kelas yang kau minati~

Mulai Kelas

Benefit yang kami disediakan

Mendapat Sertifikat

Setelah selesai mengikuti kursus, peserta akan mendapatkan sertifikat atas ikut sertaan nya dalam mengikuti kursus/kelas.

Meningkatkan Skill

Setelah mendapat pengajaran dari kursus ini anda akan mendapatkan skill dan pengalaman yang berharga.

Mendapatkan Networking

Manfaat kursus online ini sangat penting bagi kamu dalam mengembangkan karier di dunia kerja nantinya.

Kelas-Kelas Populer

Mulailah dengan kelas yang terpopuler kami untuk perjalanan belajar anda!

[academy_courses] Lebih Lanjut

Apa Kata Mereka?

Lihatlah feedbak dari penguna tentang LanguLeap ini.

Wah gak nyangka 😍. Belajar disini bisa dapat ilmu yang berguna dan bagus pula. bisa juga diaplikasikan kedalam kehidupan sehari hari nihh 👍

Erina

Siswa - SMK

Explain to you how all this mistaken. Tdea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account

Robert Linda

Marketer

Which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure. To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain advantage 😘

Nirolas Corola

Developer

I must explain to you how all this mistaken. Tdea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a 😍complete account of the system and expound the

David Rironas
Photographer

Artikel Terbaru

Jelajahi artikel gratis kami!

Membedakan ‘Do’ dan ‘Make’ dalam Bahasa Inggris

Dalam Bahasa Inggris, ‘do’ dan ‘make’ sama-sama merupakan kata kerja yang digunakan untuk menggambarkan suatu aktivitas. Tapi walaupun maknanya mirip, tapi cara penggunaan kedua kata ini tidak sama. Simak cara......

January 19, 2021

Mengiyakan Kalimat Negatif, Kalimat Bahasa Inggris yang Tidak Lazim Digunakan

Mempelajari bahasa asing memang tidak mudah. Mempelajari tata bahasa, kosa kata, dan mengenali berbagai macam istilah dan ekspresi membutuhkan waktu yang tidak sedikit dan ketekunan untuk berlatih mempraktekkan bahasa asing tersebut.......

January 19, 2021

Memahami Penggunaan Begin dan Start dalam Bahasa Inggris

Bahasa Inggris maupun Bahasa Indonesia memiliki sinonim, dimana kata yang berbeda memiliki arti yang sama, tapi digunakan secara berbeda dalam kalimat dan percakapan. Salah satunya adalah ‘begin’ dan ‘start’. Kedua kata......

January 19, 2021

item.title: Naik Kapal di Lampion Imlek Kota Solo, Susuri Sungai Bertabur Lampion
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
Penulis Anggara Wikan Prasetya | Editor Anggara Wikan Prasetya

Salah satu aktivitas yang bisa dilakukan pengunjung Lampion Imlek Pasar Gede adalah naik perahu wisata.

Sebelumnya, Lampion Imlek di kawasan Pasar Gede, Kota Solo, sudah mulai berpendar mulai Selasa (10/1/2023). Ini merupakan event tahunan di Kota Solo untuk menyambut Tahun Baru Imlek.

Lampion akan menyala sampai 30 Januari 2023 dan juga akan digelar acara, seperti Umbul Mantram pada Kamis (12/1/2023) pukul 18.00 WIB di Kelurahan Sudiropradjan, dan Karnaval Budaya pada Minggu (15/1/2023).

“Yang sudah mulai bazar UMKM, pentas seni panggung timur Kelenteng, dan perahu wisata,” kata Ketua Grebeg Sudiro tahun 2023, Selasa.

Pengunjung bisa datang ke Lampion Imlek Pasar Gede ini mulai pukul 18.30 WIB sampai 23.00 WIB.

Naik perahu wisata

Jika ingin naik perahu wisata pada momen Lampion Imlek Pasar Gede kali ini, pengunjung bisa turun ke dermaga di bawah Jembatan Pasar Gede, tepatnya belakang Bank BRI.

Tarif untuk naik perahu wisata adalah Rp 10.000 per orang. Kompas.com pun sempat menjajal langsung wahana ini pada Selasa (10/2/2023).

Perahu akan berlayar dari dermaga bawah Jembatan Pasar Gede, menyusuri Kali Pepe ke arah selatan-barat sampai Kretek Gantung.

Perjalanan nantinya akan melalui bawah Jembatan Ketandan yang bentuknya instagramable, sehingga pas untuk dipotret

Lampion yang digantung juga menghiasi jalur yang dilalui perahu wisata, sehingga mempercantik suasana.

Setelah Kretek Gantung, perahu akan putar balik dan kembali berlayang menuju titik start, yakni Dermaga Jembatan Pasar Gede.

Adapun jumlah perahu yang terbatas membuat pengunjung harus antre saat sedang ramai. Selain itu, beberapa titik sungai juga berbau agak kurang sedap, sehingga lebih baik jika membawa masker.

Source: Kompas.com

item.title: Apa Penderita Kolestrol Boleh Makan Telur?
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
Penulis Elizabeth Ayudya Ratna Rininta | Editor Elizabeth Ayudya Ratna Rininta

Beberapa orang mungkin bertanya-tanya, apakah penderita kolesterol boleh makan telur?

Pertanyaan tersebut terbilang wajar. Pasalnya, telur merupakan salah satu makanan tinggi kalori, terutama jika telur digoreng dengan minyak atau mentega dan dicampur keju atau makanan tinggi kalori lainnya.

Menurut USDA, tiap 100 gram telur memiliki kandungan kolesterol yang tinggi, yaitu sebesar 372 mg/dL.

Sementara, dalam satu butir telur ditaksir mengandung kolesterol sebesar 240 mg/dL.

Melihat banyaknya kandungan kolesterol pada telur, tak heran penderita hiperkolesterolemia ragu-ragu mengonsumsi makanan sumber protein hewani tersebut.

Apakah penderita kolesterol boleh makan telur?

Telur memang tinggi kolesterol. Namun, menurut sebuah studi yang diterbitkan Nutrients pada 2018, asupan telur hanya memberi dampak minimal pada kolesterol orang yang sehat.

Namun, orang yang memiliki kecenderungan peningkatan kolesterol dengan cepat, sebaiknya tetap waspada dalam mengonsumsi telur.

Dikutip dari Eating Well, asupan telur yang berlebihan dapat memicu kenaikan HDL dan LDL.

Jadi apakah penderita kolesterol boleh makan telur? Jawabannya adalah boleh, asal tidak berlebihan. Batas konsumsi telur pada penderita kolesterol yaitu sekitar 4 butir per minggu.

Namun, Anda mungkin perlu berkonsultasi dengan dokter atau ahli gizi untuk mengetahui batas aman dalam konsumsi telur.

Selain itu, penderita kolesterol tinggi juga dapat mengonsumsi putih telurnya saja karena terbukti rendah kolesterol, dibandingkan dengan kuning telur.

Nutrisi telur

Di samping tinggi kolesterol, telur juga memiliki beragam nutrisi yang bermanfaat bagi tubuh manusia.   Berikut macam-macam kandungan nutrisi pada telur yang berguna bagi tubuh:

  • Protein: telur mengandung 7 gram protein yang bermanfaat untuk mendukung pembentukan dan perbaikan semua fungsi sel tubuh manusia.
  • Vitamin D: menjag kesehatan tulang dan gigi.
  • Biotin: bermanfaat untuk menjaga kesehatan kulit, mengontrol gula darah, dan membantu metabolisme protein, karbohidrat, dan lemak.
  • Lutein: menjaga kesehatan mata, termasuk mencegah katarak.
  • Kalium: berguna untuk menunjang kesehatan saraf dan otot, menyeimbangkn kadar natrium.

Telur memiliki beragam nutrisi, mulai dari protein hingga kalium yang sayang untuk kita lewatkan.

Penderita kolesterol pun mungkin membutuhkan nutrisi yang terkandung pada telur untuk menjaga kesehatannya.

Namun, sebaiknya tetap berkonsultasi dahulu dengan dokter jika Anda memiliki kolesterol tinggi. Selain itu, pastikan Anda hanya mengonsumsi telur yang diolah secara sehat, seperti direbus atau dikukus. 

Source: Kompas.com

item.title: Membedakan ‘Do’ dan ‘Make’ dalam Bahasa Inggris
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
Dalam Bahasa Inggris, ‘do’ dan ‘make’ sama-sama merupakan kata kerja yang digunakan untuk menggambarkan suatu aktivitas. Tapi walaupun maknanya mirip, tapi cara penggunaan kedua kata ini tidak sama. Simak cara membedakan ‘do’ dan ‘make’ dan cara menggunakannya dengan tepat dalam Bahasa Inggris di sini.

DO

Sebagai kata kerja (auxiliary), ‘do’ memiliki bentuk ‘do’ atau ‘does’ dalam kalimat present tense, ‘did’ dalam kalimat past tense, dan ‘done’ dalam kalimat past principle. Bila digunakan dalam kalimat present tense, subjek kalimat ‘I’, ‘you’, ‘we’, dan ‘they’ akan menggunakan ‘do’, sedangkan subjek kalimat ‘he’, ‘she’, atau ‘it’ akan menggunakan ‘does’.

‘Do’ digunakan untuk menggambarkan suatu aktivitas seperti pekerjaan atau rutinitas yang dilakukan berulang kali. Biasanya ‘do’ digunakan dalam aktivitas yang tidak menghasilkan suatu benda dalam bentuk nyata.

Contoh:

-          I need to do my homework tonight, so I can do whatever I want on the weekend.

-          She doesn’t do her laundry herself.

-          He didn’t do the dishes last night like I told him to.

Seperti yang sudah dijelaskan tadi, ‘do’ digunakan dalam kalimat yang menggambarkan suatu rutinitas sehari-hari. Tapi ada beberapa pengecualian di mana penggunaan ‘do’ digantikan oleh ‘make’ dalam suatu kegiatan, yaitu dalam aktivitas membersihkan tempat tidur. Contoh:

-          You need to make your bed before you leave in the morning.

-          She already made her bed earlier today.

Selain sebagai kata kerja, ‘do’ juga digunakan sebagai collocation, yaitu ekspresi atau istilah yang terdiri dari gabungan dua kata atau lebih. Beberapa contoh ‘do’ sebagai collocation adalah:

-          A few days off will do you good.

-          I need you to do me a favor.

-          She got her hair done for the party.

MAKE

Sebagai kata kerja (auxiliary), ‘make’ memiliki bentuk ‘make’ dalam kalimat present tense dan ‘made’ dalam kalimat past tense. Dalam Bahasa Indonesia, ‘make’ memiliki arti ‘membuat’. Dengan kata lain, ‘make’ digunakan dalam kalimat yang menggambarkan aktivitas yang menghasilkan suatu benda dalam bentuk nyata.

Contoh:

-          My mother didn’t have time to make breakfast this morning.

-          Can you make me some coffee?

-          I need to make some money for my family.

-          After a year, her business finally made some profit.

Tapi ada beberapa contoh ketika ‘make’ merupakan collocation dan digunakan untuk menggambarkan aktivitas yang menghasilkan suatu benda yang tidak berwujud.

Contoh:

-          Stop making so much noise!

-          I’m glad we’re finally making progress in this project.

-          I already make plans for this weekend.

-          He promised to make an exception for me.

-          We need him to make a confession.

-          Everyone makes mistakes.

Selain itu, ‘make’ juga bisa menjadi causative verb, yaitu kata kerja yang digunakan untuk menunjukkan suatu tindakan yang dilakukan seseorang untuk mengakibatkan suatu hal lain. Contoh:

-          He makes me happy.

-          I love making him laugh.

-          Did you make her cry?

-          She made her team win the competition.

item.title: Mengiyakan Kalimat Negatif, Kalimat Bahasa Inggris yang Tidak Lazim Digunakan oleh Native Speaker
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
Mempelajari bahasa asing memang tidak mudah. Mempelajari tata bahasa, kosa kata, dan mengenali berbagai macam istilah dan ekspresi membutuhkan waktu yang tidak sedikit dan ketekunan untuk berlatih mempraktekkan bahasa asing tersebut. Saat mempelajari bahasa asing, kita tentu ingin terdengar fasih menggunakannya, dengan pengucapan yang tepat, sehingga percakapan berjalan lancar dan mudah dipahami, bahkan oleh penutur asli. Tapi ada beberapa kesalahan yang umum dilakukan oleh mereka yang sedang mempelajari Bahasa Inggris dan tidak akan dilakukan oleh penutur asli. Salah satu kesalahan umum tersebut adalah saat mengungkapkan persetujuan atau ketidaksetujuan dalam affirmative sentence (kalimat positif) dan negative sentence (kalimat negatif).

KALIMAT POSITIF

Affirmative sentence atau kalimat positif adalah pernyataan atau fakta yang sifatnya positif. Untuk mengungkapkan persetujuan atas kalimat positif seperti ini, biasanya kalimat “Me too” sering digunakan. Tapi ada cara lain untuk mengungkapkan persetujuan dengan kalimat yang lebih tepat, misalnya:

A: I love eating in that restaurant.

B: I do too.

A: She watches House of The Dragon every week.

B: So do I.

A: I think I prefer staying at home than going out this weekend.

B: I do think so to.

Sedangkan ada beberapa cara yang bisa digunakan untuk menyatakan ketidaksetujuan terhadap kalimat positif, di antaranya:

A: She was with him at the party last night.

B: No, she wasn’t.

A: They have been friends since elementary school.

B: No, they haven’t.

A: I need to go there myself.

B: No, you don’t.

KALIMAT NEGATIF

Negative sentence atau kalimat negatif adalah kalimat yang menyatakan penyangkalan, penolakan, atau rasa tidak suka pada suatu hal. Kalimat negatif biasanya menggunakan kata seperti ‘not’, ‘never’, ‘nothing’, dll.

Kesalahan yang umum dilakukan saat mempelajari Bahasa Inggris adalah menyatakan persetujuan terhadap kalimat negatif dengan cara menjawab ‘ya’ atau ‘yes’ terhadap kalimat negatif. Cara yang benar untuk menyatakan persetujuan terhadap kalimat negatif adalah:

A: I don’t like the way he teaches the class.

B: Neither do I.

A: She didn’t want to stay late at the office.

B: I didn’t either.

A: The mango is not ripe enough.

B: No, it isn’t.

Sedangkan untuk menyampaikan ketidaksetujuan terhadap kalimat negatif, cara yang tepat di antaranya adalah:

A: I can’t do that.

B: Yes, you can.

A: She won’t come tomorrow.

B: Yes, she will.

A: I am certain he didn’t do it.

B: But he did it.

DOUBLE NEGATIVE

Kesalahan lain yang kerap terjadi dalam berbahasa Inggris adalah double negative, yaitu penggunaan dua kata negatif dalam satu kalimat, sehingga kedua kata tersebut saling meniadakan satu sama lain dan malah membentuk kalimat positif. Untuk menghindari double negative, maka salah satu kata negatif harus dihilangkan atau digantikan, misalnya:

1.       You are not going nowhere.
Dua kata negatif dalam kalimat ini adalah ‘not’ dan ‘nowhere’. Kalimat di atas bisa diubah menjadi kalimat yang tepat, yaitu:

  • You are going nowhere.
  • You are not going anywhere. 

2.       It is not unbelievable.

Dua kata negatif dalam kalimat ini adalah ‘not’ dan ‘unbelievable’. Kalimat ini bisa diubah menjadi kalimat yang tepat, yaitu:

  • It’s unbelievable.
  • It is not believable.

item.title: Memahami Penggunaan Begin dan Start dalam Bahasa Inggris
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
Bahasa Inggris maupun Bahasa Indonesia memiliki sinonim, dimana kata yang berbeda memiliki arti yang sama, tapi digunakan secara berbeda dalam kalimat dan percakapan. Salah satunya adalah ‘begin’ dan ‘start’. Kedua kata tersebut memiliki arti ‘mulai’, tapi keduanya bisa digunakan dengan cara yang berbeda dalam kalimat. Apa beda dari kedua kata ini dan bagaimana cara yang tepat untuk menggunakannya?

Beberapa perbedaan antara begin dan start bisa kamu simak dalam beberapa perbandingan berikut ini:

1.       Begin biasanya digunakan dalam situasi dan kalimat yang lebih formal daripada start.

Contoh:

-          They will begin the ceremony at 7 tonight.

-          The show will start tomorrow night.

2.       Begin merupakan irregular verb (kata kerja tidak beraturan) dengan past tense began dan past participle begun. Sedangkan start merupakan regular verb (kata kerja beraturan) dengan started sebagai bentuk past tense-nya.

Contoh:

-          She started dancing since she was five years old.

-          It began to rain when she left the house.

3.       Bila kalimat menggambarkan tentang penggunaan suatu mesin, maka kata yang digunakan adalah start, bukan begin.

Contoh:

-          He started the car and drove off.

-          They couldn’t get the engine of the boat to start.

Dalam kalimat seperti contoh di atas, start tidak bisa digantikan dengan begin. Misalnya, ‘He began the car and drove off’ adalah kalimat yang salah.

4.       Bila kalimat menggambarkan tentang suatu perusahaan atau bisnis, maka kata yang digunakan adalah start, bukan begin.

Contoh:

-          He started the company back in 1997.

-          He felt that it was a good time to start his own business.

Dalam kalimat seperti contoh di atas, start tidak bisa digantikan dengan begin. Misalnya, ‘He began the company in 1997’ adalah kalimat yang salah.

5.       Start bisa digunakan sebagai kata kerja maupun kata benda, sedangkan begin hanya bisa digunakan sebagai kata kerja. Begin bisa digunakan sebagai kata benda, asalkan dalam bentuk beginning.

Contoh:

-          My mom had started cooking the dish since the night before.

-          I’m ready for a new start.

-          Her life was just about to begin.

-          She moved to the city to find a new beginning.

Selain perbedaan di atas, start dan begin juga memiliki beberapa persamaan, di antaranya:

1.       Baik start maupun begin bisa dipadankan dengan to-infinitive atau -ing.

Contoh:

-          She started to cry when she read the letter.

-          We started running away from the crowd when we heard the noise.

-          He began using drugs since a few years ago.

-          She began to learn music after she graduated from high school.

2.       Baik start maupun begin merupakan transitive verb dan intransitive verb, sehingga bisa digunakan dengan kalimat tanpa objek ataupun kalimat yang memiliki objek.

Contoh:

-          He started his own company last year.

-          The class started at 4 this evening.

-          They began to search for evidence around the crime scene.

-          “Shall we begin?” he asked her.

Do me this favor. I won't forget it. Ask your friends in the neighborhood about me. They'll tell you I know how to return a favor. I don't feel I have to wipe everybody out, Tom. Just my enemies. What's the matter with you, huh? What am I going to do? Am I going to make that baby an orphan before he's born? I'm your older brother, Mike, and I was stepped over! What's the matter with you? Is this what you've become, a Hollywood finocchio who cries like a woman? "Oh, what do I do? What do I do?" What is that nonsense? Ridiculous! Hey, listen, I want somebody good - and I mean very good - to plant that gun. I don't want my brother coming out of that toilet with just his dick in his hands, alright? Is that why you slapped my brother around in public? Fredo, you're my older brother, and I love you. But don't ever take sides with anyone against the Family again. Ever. In Sicily, women are more dangerous than shotguns. The hotel, the casino. The Corleone Family wants to buy you out. Why do you hurt me, Michael? I've always been loyal to you. Only don't tell me you're innocent. Because it insults my intelligence and makes me very angry. I don't like violence, Tom. I'm a businessman; blood is a big expense. I am sorry. What happened to your father was business. I have much respect for your father. But your father, his thinking is old-fashioned. You must understand why I had to do that. Now let's work through where we go from here. It's an old habit. I spent my whole life trying not to be careless. Women and children can afford to be careless, but not men. When they come… they come at what you love. I see you took the name of the town. What was your father's name? Friends and money - oil and water. My father taught me many things here - he taught me in this room. He taught me: keep your friends close, but your enemies closer. I have a sentimental weakness for my children and I spoil them, as you can see. They talk when they should listen. Don Corleone, I am honored and grateful that you have invited me to your home on the wedding day of your daughter. And may their first child be a masculine child. If anything in this life is certain, if history has taught us anything, it is that you can kill anyone.";s:13:"provider_name";s:0:"";}

item.title: Vocab Bahasa Inggris Profesional Saat Bicara dengan Klien
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
Saat berhadapan dengan klien bisnis, kamu tentu tidak ingin terlihat memiliki celah. Justru, kamu ingin terlihat bisa dipercaya dan sebagai sosok yang profesional. Nah, hal ini bisa kamu lakukan, salah satunya, dengan menggunakan bahasa yang baik dan benar. Jika klien bisnis kamu terbiasa berbicara dalam bahasa Inggris, sebaiknya kamu juga menguasai kosa kata bisnis dalam bahasa Inggris. Hal ini dapat dipastikan akan meningkatkan sisi profesionalitas di mata klien. Nah, berikut ini adalah beberapa contoh kosa kata bisnis dalam bahasa Inggris yang bisa kamu gunakan untuk berbicara dengan klien.

Approve

Kamu mungkin sudah terlalu familiar dengan kata “approve” hingga tidak menyadari bahwa kata yang satu ini termasuk sebagai kosa kata advanced dalam bahasa Inggris yang bisa kamu gunakan saat berhadapan dengan klien agar terlihat profesional.

Makna dari kata “approve” adalah “menerima” atau “menyetujui”. Namun, dalam dunia bisnis, kata approve memiliki makna yang lebih luas, yaitu “menyetujui sebuah rencana/ide”, atau, “sesuatu hal yang sudah cukup bagus untuk digunakan sehingga disetujui penggunaannya.”

Berikut contoh penggunaan kata “approve” dalam kalimat:

●        My company has approved the compensation package. (Perusahaanku sudah menyetujui paket kompensasinya.)

Ensure

Kata “ensure” sebenarnya tak jauh berbeda dengan “make sure.” Makna dari kata yang satu ini adalah, “untuk memastikan suatu hal”. Akan tetapi, “ensure” termasuk ke dalam advanced english atau kosa kata dalam bahasa Inggris yang sudah tergolong profesional. Alhasil, jika kamu hendak membandingkan make sure vs ensure, tentu akan lebih baik menggunakan ensure dalam situasi formal, termasuk saat berbicara dengan klien bisnis.

Nah, berikut ini contoh penggunaan kata “ensure” dalam kalimat bahasa Inggris:

●        We need to ensure that there is no issue regarding the project. (Kita harus memastikan bahwa tidak ada masalah yang berkaitan dengan proyeknya.)

Disclose

Kosa kata berikutnya yang bisa kamu gunakan saat berhadapan dengan klien bisnis adalah “disclose”. Kata yang satu ini tergolong bentuk advanced dari kata “explain” yang jika diartikan ke dalam bahasa Indonesia memiliki makna, “menjelaskan”.

Namun, dalam lingkup bisnis, kata “disclose” memiliki makna, “memberikan informasi kepada orang lain yang sebelumnya adalah sebuah informasi rahasia.” Agar lebih jelas, berikut contoh penggunaan kata “disclose” dalam kalimat bahasa Inggris:

●        I could not disclose the information before we reach an agreement. (Aku tidak bisa memberikan informasinya jika kita belum mencapai kesepakatan.)

Manage

Kata kerja yang satu ini juga bisa kamu gunakan saat berkomunikasi dengan klien bisnis. Pasalnya, kata “manage” bermakna “mengatur atau menjadi orang yang memegang tanggung jawab pada sebuah bisnis, tim, atau organisasi.” Ya, kata ini adalah bentuk kata kerja dari “manager”.

Sementara itu, kata “manager” adalah kata benda yang berarti, “seseorang yang bertanggung jawab pada sebuah bisnis, tim, atau organisasi dan lain sebagainya.” Bisa dikatakan kata “manage” adalah penjelasan dari kegiatan yang dilakukan oleh seorang “manager”.

Berikut ini adalah contoh kalimat bahasa Inggris yang menggunakan kata “manage” dengan tepat:

●        I manage business team in my company. (Aku mengatur tim bisnis di perusahaanku.)

Achieve

Kata “achieve” juga termasuk salah satu kosa kata profesional yang bisa kamu gunakan saat berbicara dengan klien bisnis. Kata yang satu ini termasuk sebagai kata kerja yang memiliki arti, “berhasil meraih tujuan, status, atau standar tertentu, khususnya jika sudah diusahakan dalam kurun waktu yang lama.”

Kosa kata ini bisa kamu gunakan jika sedang membicarakan target tertentu dengan lawan bicara yang seorang klien bisnis. Nah, berikut ini adalah contoh kalimat bahasa Inggris yang menggunakan kata “achieve” dengan tepat:

●        I believe that our company can help your company to achieve 80% of the target. (Saya percaya bahwa perusahaan kami bisa membantu perusahaan Anda untuk mencapai hingga 80% dari target.)

I’ve always been loyal to you. When they come… they come at what you love. Michael, you never told me you knew Johnny Fontane!";s:13:"provider_name";s:0:"";}

My";s:7:"address";s:0:"";s:5:"phone";s:0:"";s:4:"city";s:0:"";s:5:"email";s:0:"";s:12:"state_region";s:0:"";s:8:"zip_code";s:0:"";s:7:"country";s:0:"";s:6:"po_box";s:0:"";s:9:"job_title";s:0:"";s:6:"height";s:0:"";s:10:"birth_date";s:0:"";s:11:"birth_place";s:0:"";s:11:"nationality";s:0:"";s:8:"duration";s:0:"";s:11:"upload_date";s:0:"";s:11:"content_url";s:0:"";s:9:"embed_url";s:0:"";s:17:"interaction_count";s:0:"";s:12:"rating_value";s:0:"";s:16:"reviewed_product";s:0:"";s:11:"reviewed_by";s:0:"";s:14:"date_published";s:0:"";s:14:"publisher_type";s:0:"";s:14:"publisher_name";s:0:"";s:8:"keywords";s:0:"";s:12:"article_body";s:2016:"Godfather ipsum dolor sit amet. Why did you go to the police? Why didn’t you come to me first? My father taught me many things here – he taught me in this room. He taught me: keep your friends close, but your enemies closer. What’s the matter with you? Is this what you’ve become, a Hollywood finocchio who cries like a woman? “Oh, what do I do? What do I do?” What is that nonsense? Ridiculous! The hotel, the casino. The Corleone Family wants to buy you out. Vito, how do you like my little angel? Isn’t she beautiful? Sonny, please don’t do anything. Please don’t do anything. Leave the gun. Take the cannoli. I’m gonna make him an offer he can’t refuse. Hey, listen, I want somebody good – and I mean very good – to plant that gun. I don’t want my brother coming out of that toilet with just his dick in his hands, alright? I don’t feel I have to wipe everybody out, Tom. Just my enemies. You can act like a man! If anything in this life is certain, if history has taught us anything, it is that you can kill anyone. You talk about vengeance. Is vengeance going to bring your son back to you? Or my boy to me? My father’s name was Antonio Andolini… and this is for you. It’s a Sicilian message. It means Luca Brasi sleeps with the fishes. Your enemies always get strong on what you leave behind. Is that why you slapped my brother around in public? It’s not personal. It’s business. What’s wrong with being a lawyer? I know it was you, Fredo. You broke my heart. You broke my heart! I am sorry. What happened to your father was business. I have much respect for your father. But your father, his thinking is old-fashioned. You must understand why I had to do that. Now let’s work through where we go from here. My father is no different than any powerful man, any man with power, like a president or senator. Why do you hurt me, Michael? I’ve always been loyal to you. When they come… they come at what you love. Michael, you never told me you knew Johnny Fontane!";s:13:"provider_name";s:0:"";}

item.title: Cara mengucapkan Selamat Ulang Tahun dalam Bahasa Mandarin
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
Seperti di Indonesia, ulang tahun merupakan hari yang populer dirayakan di Cina, bahkan mereka juga mengikuti tradisi-tradisi seperti menyanyikan lagu ulang tahun dan makan kue.

Nah, berhubung hari ulang tahun adalah hari penting dalam kultur Tionghoa, penting bagi Anda yang sedang belajar bahasa Mandarin untuk mengetahui bagaimana cara mengucapkan selamat ulang tahun dalam bahasa Mandarin!

Ingin tahu bagaimana caranya? Simak pembahasannya di bawah ini ya!

Selamat Ulang Tahun dalam Bahasa Mandarin

Cara yang paling mudah untuk mengucapkan selamat ulang tahun dalam bahasa Mandarin adalah  生日快乐 (shēngrì kuàilè). Karakter awal 生日 (shēngrì) memiliki arti ‘ulang tahun’, sedangkan 快乐 (kuàilè) berarti kebahagiaan.

Ungkapan lainnya yang juga umum digunakan adalah 祝你生日快乐” (zhù nǐ shēngrì kuàilè) yang kurang lebih memiliki arti yang sama yaitu ‘selamat ulang tahun untuk Anda’.

Cara Lain Mengucapkan Selamat Ulang Tahun dalam Bahasa Mandarin

Selain dua ungkapan di atas, terdapat beberapa cara lain dalam mengucapkan selamat ulang tahun dalam bahasa Mandarin. Beberapa ungkapan di bawah ini juga bisa Anda gunakan untuk memberikan ucapan selamat ulang tahun pada konteks dan kesempatan yang berbeda-beda.

Ucapan Selamat Ulang Tahun untuk Orang yang Lebih Tua

Mandarin: 祝您生日快乐，长命百岁！
Pinyin: zhù nín shēngrì kuàilè, chángmìngbǎisuì!
Indonesia: Selamat ulang tahun dan semoga panjang umur!

Bagian pertama dari salam ini adalah versi formal dari 祝你生日快乐 (zhù nǐ shēngrì kuàilè) yang berarti “selamat ulang tahun” dengan karakter informal 你 (nǐ atau “kamu”) diubah menjadi lebih formal  您 (nín atau “kamu” ).

Bagian kedua, 长命百岁 (chángmìngbǎisuì), adalah ungkapan idiomatik yang berarti “semoga Anda hidup sampai seratus tahun.”. 长 (cháng) berarti “panjang”, 命 (mìng) berarti “hidup” dan 百岁 (bǎi suì) berarti “100 tahun.”

Ucapan Selamat Ulang Tahun untuk Teman

Mandarin: 祝你生日快乐，天天开心，幸福美满！
Pinyin: zhù nǐ shēngrì kuàilè, tiāntiān kāixīn, xìngfúměimǎn!
Indonesia: Saya mengucapkan selamat ulang tahun, semoga senang selalu setiap harinya!

Bagian pertama dari ungkapan ini juga berarti “selamat ulang tahun!” Bagian kedua, 天天开心 (tiāntiān kāixīn), adalah ungkapan informal yang artinya, “semoga Anda bahagia setiap hari!”

Bagian ketiga, 天天开心 (xìngfúměimn), terdengar sedikit lebih formal dan berarti “semoga Anda mencapai kebahagiaan yang sempurna.”

Ucapan Selamat Ulang Tahun untuk Anak Kecil

Mandarin: 祝你生日快乐，学业有成！
Pinyin: zhù nǐ shēngrì kuàilè, xuéyèyǒuchéng!
Indonesia: Selamat ulang tahun untukmu dan sukses dalam studimu!

Bagian pertama dari ungkapan ini memiliki arti “selamat ulang tahun!” Bagian kedua, 学业有成 (xuéyèyǒuchéng), adalah ungkapan idiomatik yang berarti “menjadi sukses dalam studi seseorang”, dimana 学业 (xuéyè) berarti “belajar” dan  有成(yǒuchéng) berarti “mencapai kesuksesan.”

Itulah tadi beberapa cara memberikan ucapan selamat ulang tahun dalam bahasa Mandarin.

Untuk mempelajari bahasa Mandarin lebih dalam lagi, Anda bisa mengikuti kelas bahasa Mandarin di Luminous Learning Centre. Dengan belajar bahasa Mandarin di Luminous, Anda akan dibimbing oleh mentor profesional agar proses belajar bahasa Mandarin Anda menjadi lebih efektif dan efisien.

item.title: Apa Arti Nakama pada Bahasa Jepang?
item.dc:creator: alyafauziyah
item.content:encoded:
「仲間」atau Nakama yang adalah kata yang diterjemahkan menjadi teman, rekan setim, atau rekan Anda. Nakama mengingat kembali hubungan dekat seperti keluarga. Kata tersebut disebut sebagai bagian dari suatu kelompok atau komunitas dalam arti jamak.

Batasan menganggap seseorang sebagai Nakama berbeda untuk setiap individu. Ketika Anda telah melalui banyak kesulitan dengan seseorang, mereka adalah Nakama. Jenis build-up ini sering terlihat di Shonen（少年）Anime dan Manga. Kata itu disebutkan beberapa kali dalam serial One Piece.

Monkey D. Luffy adalah karakter utama dari One Piece. Luffy dan Nakama-nya menjelajahi laut untuk mencari harta karun terbesar One Piece untuk menjadi Raja. Dia mengumpulkan krunya dengan meminta mereka “仲間になってくれ” yang berarti “bergabung dengan kami” dalam bahasa Inggris.

Lebih banyak ekspresi dengan menggunakan Nakama diantaranya yaitu:

  1. 「強 い 仲 間 が い る ん だ」
    “Saya memiliki rekan setim yang kuat”
  2. 「い い 奴 だ っ た ら 仲 間 に し よ う と 思 っ て」
    “Jika Anda pria yang baik, saya menjadikan Anda rekan setim saya”
  3.  航海士”を仲間に入れるべきだな
    “Kita harus menyertakan navigator sebagai bagian dari tim kita”

Dalam konteks One Piece, Nakama mengacu pada orang-orang yang memiliki tujuan dan takdir yang sama denganmu.

Dalam kehidupan nyata, rekan kerja yang tidak Anda sukai bisa menjadi Nakama Anda karena Anda bekerja bersama di bawah konstitusi yang sama. Kita harus ingat bahwa kata ini tidak serta merta mengecualikan musuh Anda.

「不良 仲 間」atau Furyo-Nakama diterjemahkan menjadi teman buruk dalam bahasa Inggris. Kata tersebut dirujuk dari Anime: Tokyo Revengers. Di Jepang, siswa remaja lugu di sekolah disebut furyo atau Yankee.
